```{r}

knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = "C:/Users/YXLIU3/Desktop/semaglutide_realworld_impact/icd10_exp_estimate")


setwd("C:/Users/YXLIU3/Desktop/semaglutide_realworld_impact")

library(dplyr)

# primary dx: demo, as the template
exp_prncp <- read.csv("exp_prncp_100pct.csv")

# all dx
exp_inpatient <- read.csv("exp_inpatient_.9threshold_20pct.csv") %>%
  mutate(exp_total_inpatient = b_total) %>%
  select(icd10, exp_total_inpatient)

exp_outpatient <- read.csv("exp_outpatient_.9threshold_20pct.csv")%>%
  mutate(exp_total_outpatient = b_total) %>%
  select(icd10, exp_total_outpatient)

exp_all <- exp_outpatient %>%
  full_join(exp_inpatient, by = 'icd10')

write.csv(exp_all, "exp_all_20pct.csv", row.names = F)


```
